languages.text: Неунывающий капитан Вести произнес короткую молитву за благополучное завершение вылазки: "Да вернемся же мы отсюда немного богаче, чем прибыли! Ибо обретя добычу, мы возрадуемся, а всякая радость честного человека есть слезы еретиков и хаосопоклонников!"

The irrepressible Captain Vesti offered up a brief prayer for a favourable outcome to the expedition: "May we leave this place a little richer than when we arrived! For rich men are joyous men, and an honest man's joy makes heretics and Chaos cultists weep!"
languages.original_text: Неунывающий капитан Вести произнес короткую молитву за благополучное завершение вылазки: "Да вернемся же мы отсюда немного богаче, чем прибыли! Ибо обретя добычу, мы возрадуемся, а всякая радость честного человека есть слезы еретиков и хаосопоклонников!"

traits.locale_text: The irrepressible Captain Vesti offered up a brief prayer for a favorable outcome to the expedition: "May we leave this place a little richer than when we arrived! For rich men are joyous men, and an honest man's joy makes heretics and Chaos cultists weep!"

The irrepressible Captain Vesti offered up a brief prayer for a favorable outcome to the expedition: "May we leave this place a little richer than when we arrived! For rich men are joyous men, and an honest man's joy makes heretics and Chaos cultists weep!"

The irrepressible Captain Vesti offered up a brief prayer for a favorable outcome to the expedition: "May we leave this place a little richer than when we arrived! For rich men are joyous men, and an honest man's joy makes heretics and Chaos cultists weep!"

The irrepressible Captain Vesti offered up a brief prayer for a favourable outcome to the expedition: "May we leave this place a little richer than when we arrived! For rich men are joyous men, and an honest man's joy makes heretics and Chaos cultists weep!"

languages.text: El incontenible capitán Vesti ofreció una breve plegaria, pidiendo un resultado favorable para la expedición. «¡Ruego que salgamos de este lugar algo más ricos de lo que llegamos! Pues los hombres ricos son hombres felices, ¡y la alegría de un hombre honrado hace que los herejes y los cultos del Caos lloren!».
languages.original_text: The irrepressible Captain Vesti offered up a brief prayer for a favourable outcome to the expedition: "May we leave this place a little richer than when we arrived! For rich men are joyous men, and an honest man's joy makes heretics and Chaos cultists weep!"

traits.locale_text: El incontenible capitán Vesti ofreció una breve plegaria, pidiendo un resultado favorable para la expedición. «¡Ruego que salgamos de este lugar algo más ricos de lo que llegamos! Pues los hombres ricos son hombres felices, ¡y la alegría de un hombre honrado hace que los herejes y los cultos del Caos lloren!».

languages.text: 抑制不住兴奋的维斯提上尉简短地祈祷一番，希望这场探索能一切顺利。“希望等咱们走人的时候，能比咱们进来的时候更有钱！因为有钱才会开心，而一旦诚实的人开心起来，那些异端分子与混沌信徒就要痛哭流涕了！”
languages.original_text: The irrepressible Captain Vesti offered up a brief prayer for a favourable outcome to the expedition: "May we leave this place a little richer than when we arrived! For rich men are joyous men, and an honest man's joy makes heretics and Chaos cultists weep!"

traits.locale_text: 抑制不住兴奋的维斯提上尉简短地祈祷一番，希望这场探索能一切顺利。“希望等咱们走人的时候，能比咱们进来的时候更有钱！因为有钱才会开心，而一旦诚实的人开心起来，那些异端分子与混沌信徒就要痛哭流涕了！”

languages.text: ヴェスティ中隊長は堪えきれず、遠征が良い結果に終わるよう短い祈りをささげた。「到着した時より少しでも懐が温かくなってこの場所を出発できますように！金持ちになれば楽しいし、素直に喜んでいれば、異端者やケイオス・カルティストを泣かせられますからね！」
languages.original_text: The irrepressible Captain Vesti offered up a brief prayer for a favourable outcome to the expedition: "May we leave this place a little richer than when we arrived! For rich men are joyous men, and an honest man's joy makes heretics and Chaos cultists weep!"

traits.locale_text: ヴェスティ中隊長は堪えきれず、遠征が良い結果に終わるよう短い祈りをささげた。「到着した時より少しでも懐が温かくなってこの場所を出発できますように！金持ちになれば楽しいし、素直に喜んでいれば、異端者やケイオス・カルティストを泣かせられますからね！」

languages.text: Der unkontrollierbare Captain Vesti sprach ein kurzes Gebet für ein positives Ergebnis der Expedition: "Mögen wir diesen Ort ein wenig reicher verlassen, als wir ihn betreten haben! Denn reiche Menschen sind frohe Menschen, und der Frohsinn eines ehrlichen Menschen bringt Ketzer und Chaos-Kultisten zum Heulen!"
languages.original_text: The irrepressible Captain Vesti offered up a brief prayer for a favourable outcome to the expedition: "May we leave this place a little richer than when we arrived! For rich men are joyous men, and an honest man's joy makes heretics and Chaos cultists weep!"

traits.locale_text: Der unkontrollierbare Captain Vesti sprach ein kurzes Gebet für ein positives Ergebnis der Expedition: "Mögen wir diesen Ort ein wenig reicher verlassen, als wir ihn betreten haben! Denn reiche Menschen sind frohe Menschen, und der Frohsinn eines ehrlichen Menschen bringt Ketzer und Chaos-Kultisten zum Heulen!"

languages.text: L'indomptable capitaine Vesti prononça une brève prière pour que l'expédition ait un résultat favorable : « Puissions-nous repartir un peu plus riches qu'à notre arrivée, car la richesse fait le bonheur, et il n'y a rien de tel que la joie d'un honnête homme pour faire pleurer les hérétiques et les cultistes du Chaos ! »
languages.original_text: The irrepressible Captain Vesti offered up a brief prayer for a favourable outcome to the expedition: "May we leave this place a little richer than when we arrived! For rich men are joyous men, and an honest man's joy makes heretics and Chaos cultists weep!"

traits.locale_text: L'indomptable capitaine Vesti prononça une brève prière pour que l'expédition ait un résultat favorable : « Puissions-nous repartir un peu plus riches qu'à notre arrivée, car la richesse fait le bonheur, et il n'y a rien de tel que la joie d'un honnête homme pour faire pleurer les hérétiques et les cultistes du Chaos ! »

languages.text: Zapt edilemez Yüzbaşı Vesti, keşfin başarıyla sonuçlanması için kısa bir dua zikretmeye başladı. "Bu mekândan, vardığımızdan bir gömlek daha zengin ayrılalım! Zengin insan, mutlu insandır. Dürüst insanın neşesi, kâfirlerin ve Kaos'a tapınanların gözyaşlarıdır!"
languages.original_text: The irrepressible Captain Vesti offered up a brief prayer for a favourable outcome to the expedition: "May we leave this place a little richer than when we arrived! For rich men are joyous men, and an honest man's joy makes heretics and Chaos cultists weep!"

traits.locale_text: Zapt edilemez Yüzbaşı Vesti, keşfin başarıyla sonuçlanması için kısa bir dua zikretmeye başladı: "Bu mekândan, vardığımızdan bir gömlek daha zengin ayrılalım! Zengin insan, mutlu insandır. Dürüst bir insanın neşesi ise kâfirlerin ve Kaos'a tapınanların gözyaşlarıdır!"
